item.title: 01 - Intro to Blockchain & Smart Contracts
item.description: What is “blockchain”? “Blockchain technology” is the buzzword in the business. You probably have heard about everything but the kitchen sink being put “on the blockchain.” Let’s review what a blockchain actually is.
